tab1.text1:
<TextStyle.Red>CS Gravestone Update:</> Please do not rely on the CS Gravestone to recover items until you hear otherwise from us. After speaking with the creator of CS and reviewing our logs together, she confirmed that there is a logic issue affecting that specific part of the mod. She did not provide details on the exact cause, only that the issue has been identified and will be fixed in the next update. Until that update is released, we will be adding the APD Recovery Stone back to the cluster, and once the CS Gravestone update is live and we have thoroughly tested it, we will remove the APD Recovery Stone again as long as everything is working correctly. We have added APD Recovery stone back to the server now and it will remain until the CS Update. Thank you for your patience while we work to resolve this issue.

Join the adventure: <TextStyle.Green>dsc.gg/twistedwhiskers</>

Before beginning your journey, we recommend exploring the tabs above. They contain vital information about rules, rates, mods, and events. Checking these regularly ensures you’re always up to date, as rates and rules may change based on community votes.

Join our Discord to share feedback, participate in polls, and help shape the future of the cluster.

<TextStyle.Green>Accessing This Screen:</>
PC: Press F1
PlayStation 5: Hold Square → Select the wolf icon → Press R2

<TextStyle.Green>Free Starter Kits:</> Visit www.twistedkittensgaming.com. One free kit is available per survivor. If you received a starter automatically, you will not be eligible for the web version. See the Shop tab for more details.

Welcome to the community. Enjoy your stay and happy surviving!
tab1.text3:
<TextStyle.Violet>Important Server Information</>

• Restart Time: 3AM EST Daily
• See the Rates Tab for updated settings.
• Link your Discord and in-game account for bonus tokens:
  https://twistedkittensgaming.premiumark.net/news/67145-Tkg-Webshop

<TextStyle.Violet>Chat Commands</>

!help - Lists available commands
!balance - Shows your token balance
!report - Sends a report to admins
!review - Opens a feedback form
!dinowipe - Displays dino wipe schedule
!rules - Displays current rules
!flag - Gives a compliance flag kit
!die - Respawns your character
!reset - Teleports to a known safe location (no tames)
!discord - Discord link
!website - Website link
!shop - Admin shop link

tab2.text1:
<TextStyle.White>Twisted Whiskers Cluster Rules
Twisted Kittens Cluster – The Laws of Survival
Welcome to the Ark, survivor. These are the rules that keep chaos in check. Obey them, or risk the wrath of the wild... and the whiskers.
Suggestions are always welcome — your voice matters in the pride.

<TextStyle.Violet>Territory & Tribal Claims</>
Each Tribe may claim two bases within each map. The size of each must not cause other players lag or fence in huge swaths of land. In the future there may be a device provided to illustrate your limitations.
Lone wolves (solo players) may also have one of each.
If a solo player joins a tribe, their base must be dismantled and merged into the tribe’s official stronghold.

Claiming more than your allowed base locations will result in admin action.

<TextStyle.Violet>Building With Balance</>
• Feel free to build your dream sanctuary — just keep it clean, fair, and performance-friendly.
• Planning a mega base?  Request approval from an admin before expanding beyond the norm.
• You may not block:
→ High-resource zones
→ Explorer Notes
→ Artifact caves or terminals

No structure spam.
Taming traps must be cleaned up after use. Don’t litter the land.

<TextStyle.Violet>Code of the Wild</>
No offline breeding — your babies deserve attention.
No egg theft — what hatches in your nest stays in your nest.
Harassment is never tolerated. Respect your fellow survivors.
Trust is earned — we are not referees for tribe drama. Handle it like grown kittens.

<TextStyle.Violet>The Harsh Truth</>
Lost a tame? A bag full of loot vanished? That’s Ark.
Admins will not replace losses — this is a survival game, and tragedy is part of the tale.
Admin support is handled in order received, and as time allows.
We’re human too, with jobs, families, and naps to take.
Abandoned creatures left at others’ bases or obelisks will be wiped without mercy or warning.

<TextStyle.Red>Disciplinary Path (The Rule of Three)</>
First Offense – Verbal warning + 24hr notice to fix the issue (posted in Discord)
Second Offense – Involved structures, tames, or players may be wiped
Failure to correct the issue after 24hr = automatic second offense
Third Offense (within 30 days) – Permanent banishment from the pride

<TextStyle.Green>Honor the Pride</>
Report rule-breakers to an admin
Those who support the server, uphold the rules, and help the pride flourish will be rewarded with generous gifts and eternal kitten approval.
The ARK is brutal. The kittens are twisted. But with respect, wit, and a touch of madness… you’ll thrive.
tab2.text2:
<TextStyle.Green>Server Rates (Updated 05/20/2025)</>

<TextStyle.Green>Experience</>
XP 1.5x (Alpha Kill: 1.33x, Boss: 2.5x, Wild Kill: 1.25x, Crafting: 1.25x)

<TextStyle.Green>Taming & Harvest</>
Taming Speed: 5x
Harvest Amount: 2.5x

<TextStyle.Green>Player Settings</>
Water Drain: 0.75x
Food Drain: 0.75x
Health Recovery: 2.5x
Player Resistance: 1.25x
Damage Output: 1.25x

<TextStyle.Green>World Settings</>
Decay Timer: 3.5x
Structure Resistance: 0x
Day/Night Cycle: 24h = 120min IRL
Map location visibility: Enabled
tab2.text3:
<TextStyle.White>Flag System Rules</>

<TextStyle.Violet>Normal Players</>
You must update your tribe's flag before the end of each month.
We announce the next required flag color one week in advance.
If your flag is not updated before the first wipe wave, your entire tribe will be wiped on that map — no compensation will be given.

<TextStyle.Violet>Subscribed Players</>
You need to change your flag every 3 months.
We’ll inform you of the upcoming required colors.
If you cancel your subscription, your tribe must follow the normal player flag schedule from then on.
If you stop playing and inform us, we will remove your base.
– Your items and tames may be auctioned.
– If your base is cool or nicely built, we might auction off the entire base as well.

<TextStyle.Violet>Admins</>
Admins must also change their flags every 6 months.
If an admin fails to update their flag on time, their tribe will be wiped, and items and tames may be auctioned.
If the base is noteworthy or well-built, it may also be auctioned off.

<TextStyle.Violet>Violations = Tribe Wipe</>
Any tribe with an incorrect or outdated flag during a wipe will have the entire tribe wiped on that map.
No warnings or partial wipes — if one part of the tribe breaks the rule, the whole tribe is affected.
Items and tames from wiped tribes may be salvaged and auctioned.
In some cases, the entire base may be auctioned, especially if it’s well-designed or unique.

<TextStyle.Violet>Flag Color Decisions</>
Admins choose all flag colors.
No exceptions will be made for any player, tribe, or role.

<TextStyle.Violet>Admin Flag (Valid for 180 days)</>
Jan-June: Azure / Twilight
July-Dec: Blue / Green

<TextStyle.Violet>Donor Flag (Valid for 90 Days)</>
Jan – Mar: Purple / Cyan
Apr – Jun: Magenta / Blue
Jul – Sep: Yellow / Baby Blue
Oct – Dec: Red / Navy Blue

<TextStyle.Violet>Free To Play Flag (Valid for 30 Days)</>
January – Blue
February – Pink
March – Forest Green
April – Brick
May – Royal
June – Magenta
July – Red
August – Olive
September – Yellow
October – Black
November – Orange
December – Green

tab3.text1:
<TextStyle.Orange>Monthly Events</>

• Word of the Month: Say the secret word in chat to receive free tokens. A new word is introduced each month.
• Starter Lotto: Participate in the webshop lottery for a chance to win up to 1000 tokens. Higher tiers will be added soon.
tab3.text2:
<TextStyle.Violet>Performance Tips</>

Improve performance on consoles or low-end PCs by following the guide below:
https://twistedkittensgaming.premiumark.net/news/92130-commands-to-help-console-and-lower-speedperformance-pcs

<TextStyle.Green>Quick Chat Command Reference</>
!help | !balance | !report | !review | !dinowipe | !rules | !flag | !die | !reset | !discord | !website | !shop
tab3.text3:
<TextStyle.Red>Bob’s Beach Treasure Hunt</>
Search beaches on each map for hidden treasure caches. They are refreshed monthly and contain valuable rewards such as tames, building materials, token consumables, and other surprises.
tab3.text4:
<TextStyle.White>Upcoming Quests</>
Future quests will be announced soon. You may suggest quest ideas in Discord under #event-suggestions.

tab4.text1:
<TextStyle.White>Support other survivors by purchasing from registered player-run shops.</>

<TextStyle.Orange>Benefits of Registered Shops</>
• No spayed or neutered tames may be sold.
• All tame sales must include a saddle.
• Token transactions are fully admin-enforced.

Registered shop owners provide trustworthy and quality service. Any violations result in penalties for the seller.

<TextStyle.Violet>Featured Shop</>
Shop Name: Dragonstone Egg Emporium
Discord: MalachThor
Owner: Dragon Lord
Map: The Island
Location: 65.6, 31.2 (TP: Dragonstone)
Goods Sold: Tames and Eggs
tab4.text2:
<TextStyle.Green>Consumer Rights</>
• All token transactions are enforceable by admin staff.
• Report issues through Discord, in-game (!report), or via www.twistedkittensgaming.com.

<TextStyle.Violet>Include in your report:</>
- Date of transaction or violation
- Type of transaction or issue (example: missing saddle)
- Shop name and location
- Survivor name of seller

Admins will investigate and resolve the issue promptly.
tab4.text3:
For a complete list of verified player and admin shops, visit:
www.twistedkittensgaming.com
